name: old_betall
author: Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB)
description: Automated brain extraction tool for FSL involving both T1 and T2 images

inputs.description: Input T1 image file root (e.g. img_t1.nii.gz)
inputs.name: T1 File Root

inputs.description: Input T2 image file root (e.g. img_t2.nii.gz)
inputs.name: T2 File Root

output-files.description: Output file root for T1 image
output-files.name: Output T1 File Root

output-files.description: Output file root for T2 image
output-files.name: Output T2 File Root
